message: Hi Bob, I have a unique product that I think you might be interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120
I understand you're interested in the product, but $120 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $180.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go up to $180. How about $140?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $140 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you at $160.
I'm getting close to your price, but I'd like to meet you at $155
We're very close now! I'm willing to meet you at $159, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm not sure I want to go up to $159, I was thinking more along the lines of $154
I'm not sure I can go any lower than $159, but I'm willing to compromise. How about $157.50?
I'm really close to walking away, but I'll meet you in the middle at $157
I think we're really close now. I'm willing to meet you at $158, but that's as close to $157 as I can get.
